IRBlaster

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
ca.weblite.irblaster  

IRBlaster

An API for using the IR (Infrared) blaster that is available in selected Android devices

Synopsis

This library provides access to the ConsumerIrManager Android class in Codename One, which provides an API to control the IR blaster on supported devices.

The IRBlaster class provides the full API.
